'use strict'
 
const agent = {
  id: 1,
  uuid: 'yyy-yyy-yyy',
  name: 'fixture',
  username: 'platzi',
  hostname: 'test-host',
  pid: 0,
  connected: true,
  createdAt: new Date(),
  updatedAt: new Date()
}
 
const agents = [
  agent,
  extend(agent, {id: 2, uuid: 'yyy-yyy-yyw', connected: false, username: 'test'}),
  extend(agent, {id: 3, uuid: 'yyy-yyy-yyx'}),
  extend(agent, {id: 4, uuid: 'yyy-yyy-yyz', username: 'test'})
]
 
function extend (obj, values) {
  const clone = Object.assign({}, obj)
  return Object.assign(clone, values)
}
 
module.exports = {
  single: agent,
  all: agents,
  connected: agents.filter(a => a.connected),
  platzi: agents.filter(a => a.username == 'platzi'),
  byUuid: uuid => agents.filter(a => a.uuid == uuid).shift(),
  byId: id => agents.filter(a => a.id == id).shift()
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 26 2018 14:57:24 GMT-0600 (CST)
